strings.string: Thank you for choosing [COLOR=FocusedTextColor]XBMC Connected[/COLOR].[CR]Latest XBMC release is always recommended.
Be sure to visit Skin Options under Settings.[CR]Settings can be viewed by pressing right on the home page.
Configure Video settings, Including:[CR][CR]- File Stacking[CR]- Library Options[CR]- Screen Calibration[CR]- Player Options[CR]- Subtitle Format
Configure Music settings, Including:[CR][CR]- Visualisations[CR]- Library Options[CR]- Player Options[CR]- Last.FM[CR]- CD Ripping[CR]- Karaoke
Configure Photo settings, Including:[CR][CR]- File Options[CR]- SlideShow
Configure Service settings, Including:[CR][CR]- Video Modes[CR]- Trainer Options
Configure Weather settings, Including:[CR][CR]- Cities[CR]- Regions[CR]- Zip Codes
Configure Network settings, Including:[CR][CR]- IP Address & HTTP Proxy[CR]- FTP & Web Server Settings[CR]- Autodetect System[CR]- SMB Client [CR]- uPnP Settings
Configure System settings, Including:[CR][CR]- Debug Logging[CR]- LED Colors[CR]- LCD Settings[CR]- Autorun[CR]- Harddisk Management[CR]- Cache Memory[CR]- Video & Audio Hardware[CR]- Master Lock
Configure Display settings, Including:[CR][CR]- Skin Selection[CR]- RSS Options[CR]- Region Selection[CR]- Date & Time[CR]- Screen Resolution[CR]- Screensaver Options
Configure Profiles, Including:[CR][CR]- Creating Profiles[CR]- Deleting Profiles[CR]- User Settings[CR]- Profile Locks
View System Information, Including:[CR][CR]- Storage[CR]- Hardware[CR]- Network[CR]- Video[CR]- XBMC Credits
Configure Skin settings, Including:[CR][CR]- Home Options[CR]- Media View Settings[CR]- Background Options[CR]- Hide/Show Scrollbars[CR]- Reset Skin Settings
